remarks: Obsolete version of ~ ghmlin as of 15-Mar-2020.  Linearity of a group homomorphism.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
ghomlinOLD.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
ghomlinOLD $p |- ( ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( F ` A ) H ( F ` B ) ) = ( F ` ( A G B ) ) ) $.
